data.text: @AWHarzing @MiddlesexUni Thank you Anne-Wil, your thoughtful words made my day! Your unwavering support as a mentor has made all of this possible ❤️
@santosclara @MiddlesexUni What a powerful image @santosclara. You have been amazing in the past year, a fountain of creativity and passion and a big support to all of us.☺️☺️☺️

@santosclara We sure do miss you too ☺️

Take it easy, step by step. I hope you feel better soon.
@LezleeJayne Thank you Lezlee ❤️! It’s a slow process, but seems to be moving in the right direction… I miss you and our Lincoln colleagues!
@santosclara @MiddlesexUni Hope you’re feeling better now Clarice, take care of yourself lovely lady 😊
